001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json;
003
004import java.util.ServiceLoader;
005
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule;
007
008import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.modules.ModuleOptions;
009
010/**
011 * Interface to supply a Jackson {@link SimpleModule} specified by a {@link ServiceLoader}
012 */
013public interface ModuleSupplier {
014    SimpleModule getModule(final ModuleOptions options);
015}
